original_text: he took his kinsmen with him and pursued him for seven days and followed close after him into the hill country of Gilead.
korean_text: 라반이 그의 형제를 거느리고 칠 일 길을 쫓아가 길르앗 산에서 그에게 이르렀더니

sentences.original_text: he took his kinsmen with him
and pursued him for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 칠 일 동안 그를 쫓았다

sentences.original_text: into the hill country of Gilead
